## Triage Checklist
- [ ] Reproduced the issue
- [ ] Identified root cause
- [ ] Assigned to appropriate team member

## Labels Reference
### Severity
- `severity:low` - Minor issue, cosmetic or low impact
- `severity:medium` - Functional issue with workaround
- `severity:high` - Major issue affecting core functionality
- `severity:critical` - App crash or data loss

### Category
- `category:crash` - App crashes or freezes
- `category:ui` - Visual or interaction issues
- `category:performance` - Slow or laggy behavior
- `category:feature` - Feature not working as expected
- `category:other` - Other issues

### Platform
- `platform:android`
- `platform:ios`
- `platform:web`
- `platform:windows`
- `platform:macos`
- `platform:linux`
